location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no.4408 of 1855 from Henry Anderson, Secretary to the Government of Bombay, to Commander Felix Jones, Acting Resident in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: The letter is an acknowledgement of receipt of the former Resident in the Persian Gulf Captain Arnold Kemball’s letters relating to an incident of piracy committed by subjects of Aboothabee [Abu Dhabi] against a boat from Bahrain. Anderson writes that His Lordship in Council approves of Kemball’s proceedings.
